website_summaries.verdict: Excellent set for the player with some experience who's looking for the basic clubs.
pros: Set includes bag, two woods, a hybrid wood, six irons, and a putter
Trusted brand name in club development
Reasonably good price point for this quality of golf set

customer_reviews.title: Nice clubs
customer_reviews.text: A little mislead about the full 11 piece set, didn't realize head covers and the bag were considered were part of the set.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie T.

customer_reviews.title: Very misleading
customer_reviews.text: Beware: Advertised as a 11 piece set I gave it (5) STARS under light weight because it only came with (7) clubs; there, of course it was light weight. Nothing was in it Received (7) golf clubs Part of the 11 piece is the bag and the headcovers
customer_reviews.author: Bodie

customer_reviews.title: Great set for beginners, Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great set for me, a beginner. My partner is an avid golfer and he was impressed by what this set includes. I was EXTREMELY IMPRESSED with the company’s customer service. My driver arrived with a dent and I called the service number, waited about a minute before being connected to someone who arranged for me to have a brand new set delivered ASAP. Can’t beat that!
customer_reviews.author: sf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as an extra to keep in Arizona when we visit our family there in the winter. I was very pleased with the quality. I am a senior citizen and I golf twice a week when the weather permits. I do not golf competitively. For me, for my purposes as a recreational golfer, this set was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SallyH

customer_reviews.title: It is not 11 clubs!!!
customer_reviews.text: This advertisement said it was a 11 piece set.... complete! I know 14 clubs is the maximum but no idea we would be counting head covers and a bag as pieces. Not impressed with the advertised description.
customer_reviews.author: Russell A

customer_reviews.title: High recommend for new beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing. I am a beginner and have never used a set of clubs that fit my size. Absolutely recommend this set to any beginner! Super stylish and totally transformed my shots.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice Clubs
customer_reviews.text: These clubs fit me well, and look fabulous. I am not a competitive golfer and never will be, so I don't need name brand, expensive clubs. As a Steelers fan, I am in love with the black and gold bag!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M S

customer_reviews.title: Try Before You Buy
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these clubs because they were not a good fit for me and I was very unhappy with the feel of the clubs after trying them out on a short course. The bag was very nice, however. The return process was very easy so that was a positive.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rosengard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I never thought a new set of clubs could improve my game but it absolutely did. Love them. I’m 5’8 perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Mogan

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I've been using hand-me-down clubs for my entire life. I always get my moms clubs after she gets new ones. I decided to finally get my own. I don't golf a lot, but i'm considering joining a women's golf group. So I decided to get these on sale during Prime Days. I'm very happy with the clubs. I took them to the Driving range and I hit really well with them. I may keep my driver instead of the one that came in the set but I haven't really decided yet. I need to give it a couple more tries. Its a great set for a beginner or someone who doesn't golf a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to hit
customer_reviews.text: Love these clubs. They hybrids are amazing, I can actually hit them. I’ve been playing for 30 years and my last set of Calloways were very expensive but 15 years old and I could never hit the hybrids. I also replaced the driver in the old set for an expensive one. But this set has a great driver, they are all easy to hit and the ball goes far. When I’m playing consistently my handicap is about a 15, so not the best golfer but I mostly get bogeys with some pars. I am very satisfied with these clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Gabor

customer_reviews.title: Recommend the clubs, be wary of delivery speed
customer_reviews.text: I did return this item. Never used them but the quality is definitely there. The reason why I returned is because delivery was very delayed and I ended up getting a golf club set for my girlfriend at a sporting good store instead because I needed the club set quickly. The reason why 4 stars is because amazon handed off the clubs to usps and that's what caused the late delay despite it supposed to be next day or two day shipping, can't remember which one. The clubs were delivered approximately 5-7 days late. If you don't need them right away definitely recommend buying these clubs. They are great for entry level and begginers and the bag is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Decent value
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th golf season and I felt I needed new clubs. This set is quite light. At first I thought the grips were narrow. They are a wee bit narrower than the clubs they are replacing but I haven't had an issue in use. I have only used them on the course once, though I have been to the range a few times. I am not using the bag. (I had previously bought a cart bag I like very much.) Frankly the bag that comes with the set is junk. It doesn't look to me like it would last long and I do not like the style.
customer_reviews.author: janet orcutt

customer_reviews.title: Quality set.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of ladies clubs. Perfect number of clubs. My golf teacher gave this set a “Great set for leisure golfer”
customer_reviews.author: Josh Mann

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price But Scuff Easily
customer_reviews.text: I’ve enjoyed using these clubs, and I feel they’ve helped my game. My other set was really old so I definitely needed an update, but I’m still a “beginner” at golf. The only downside is they get scuff marks right away. They already look like they’ve been used a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Reader

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Went to a big golf store and picked up their beginner set (Top Flight). It was almost the same price as the Callaway Strata but looked like it cost $100. I returned it and got this Callaway Strata set. I love it. Very light and easy to handle. I seem to hit the clubs well too. It is a very sharp looking set!! I've been out (to golf) twice so far!
customer_reviews.author: Katinahat

customer_reviews.title: Screaming pink and incomplete.
customer_reviews.text: I was in a pinch and needed a set of clubs. Read description carefully. Three of the pieces are head-covers and there is no sand wedge. Of course it’s lightweight because there are only 7 clubs. This set is screaming pink and incomplete. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Robyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clubs for a woman!!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get back into golf after being out of it for 25 years. I'm 65, and these Callaway Strata Ultimate clubs are perfect for me. I can't believe the technology changes since I last swung a club! These are great! And this seller was wonderful to deal with and has super-fast shipping. Very Happy!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MtnJan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I’ve only tried these clubs out at the driving range, but can’t wait to get out on the course with them. I love the hybrid clubs. I think these 2 clubs alone will really improve my game by giving me the distance I need on the fairway. I really like this set. It’s a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RockA

customer_reviews.title: Good set for beginners, only.
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners! The clubs seem to be well made but get a new bag. It’s cheaply made and it’s noticeable right away. They also don’t have the Callaway branding on any of the clubs or bag, which they probably did on purpose. They don’t want to be known to make cheap looking product. These should be used as a BEGINNER set, not a set you want to use for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set of Womens clubs, terrible financial investment.
customer_reviews.text: The clubs are great. Light weight, complete set of everything you will need for intermediate play. Unfortunately between green fees, golf balls, and all the time my wife spends with her golf pro "friend" Ty Webb these might be the worst investment I have made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. D.

customer_reviews.title: Already used though advertised as new
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set of clubs based on a recommendation from a friend and think they’re a great set for beginners. That being said, after unboxing this new set of clubs it was very clear that they’d already been used and some clubs (particularly the putter) were quite banged up already. I didn’t return them since I know as soon as I start playing they’ll get scuffed up, but pretty disappointing given the price tag and that they’re advertised as new.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Nies

customer_reviews.title: Strata Ultimate Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about ordering clubs online that I had never handled but decided to take a chance. It was a great decision. They are much lighter than my old clubs and easier to swing. I was never able to hit my 3 wood but with this set, I can not only hit the 3 wood, but can hit all of the clubs. I am enjoying golf so much more now and my score is steadily coming down. Love these clubs.
customer_reviews.author: janice sinfield

customer_reviews.title: Daughters first set
customer_reviews.text: Did research and found a great set for beginning teenagers... Very nice set, can't wait to got out of this polar vortex so she can hit the range with me to learn her clubs...
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE CLUBS
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5’ senior woman and these irons were about an inch longer then my old clubs. The driver is 1 1/2” longer then my old club. I considered returning them but decided to give them a try. . I LOVE THESE CLUBS! My first day out I out drove all in my group. I’m so glad I have them. I’m very happy with my Strata's.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Starter Set for Wife
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of these clubs. Excellent build, materials, craftsmanship. Wife loves them and hitting them very well. Daughter liked them so much I am going to get her a set too. Good price, can't go wrong with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped my Game
customer_reviews.text: I shouldn't technically be a beginner golfer, but I am not good. The forgiving nature of the woods has helped tremendously. My golf foursome had two players get the clubs last year and I noticed an improvement in their game as well. This was a great Prime Day purchase for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Biermann

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying these because there were no reviews at the time; however, they are amazing! They look great and they will work for anyone whether you are a seasoned golfer or just starting out. These are a major upgrade from my old Wilson clubs I was using. You definitely won't be disappointed with these clubs!
customer_reviews.author: Dani D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic starter set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife after she unwisely sold her old set of Clubs. She got a new Friend at work who likes to play golf and now needed new ones! She is very happy with them, and to all appearances they are a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Cummons

customer_reviews.title: So girly
customer_reviews.text: I so love it. But I didn't see any name Callaway anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Hybrids are where it’s at!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought the 16 piece set! I’ve been playing with 20 year old steel shaft clubs, and my hands have always hurt. Hit 2 buckets of balls with these and zero pain. The hybrids are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Vbcoachc

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY NEW CLUBS!
customer_reviews.text: These clubs make me want to go out and golf! I love how light they are and easy to maneuver. Highly recommended for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: M0NIKAbang

customer_reviews.title: They're cute!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought them for me so I would start playing golf with him. I don't know much about the quality or whatever but I like the colors and all his friends have said it's a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great set for beginner
customer_reviews.text: My husband surprised me with these recently. I have been able to use them a couple of times now and I love them! Easy to use because they are light weight, and a great variety to practice with. We don't golf enough to spend more than we did on these, so overall, VERY happy!
customer_reviews.author: PBaker

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Solid Set
customer_reviews.text: These will play for several years at least. Great beginner set that will take you along until you buy your first serious set. Next stop up is something like Calloway Rogue or Rouge x for a whole lot more money.
customer_reviews.author: Keeper

customer_reviews.title: Organized Beauty!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my birthday. Love them! They are lightweight but strong. Perfect length for me at 5 feet 4 inches. Stylish! Bag is roomy and organized.
customer_reviews.author: Jan  S.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter clubs!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently started golfing and weren't sure if we were going to stick with it. This has been an amazing starter set. The value for the price is definitely worth it for beginner or casual golfers.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda S.

customer_reviews.title: Banger
customer_reviews.text: I have golfed for 28 years, I was banging the 7 iron 170 yards from my woman’s bag. As far as I hit my clubs which were dinosaurs, made me buy new clubs. Buy these for the beginner which will last a couple seasons
customer_reviews.author: Scott O

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of clubs. The grips feel good, the weight is nice, and they come with several drivers that really work well! I have played two rounds of golf so far with these and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Working out great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Playing lots of 3-par right now, and perfect for my 14 year old daughter. We will hit major course soon and so far, great set of clubs. Nice bag. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Blueeyedog

customer_reviews.title: Love these but they are filled with dents first time out...
customer_reviews.text: The clubs are light and easy to hit for beginners. It’s a great set of clubs but unfortunately there must be a manufacturing issue because my hybrid 3 was dented the first time I played and the driver followed suit the third time I played 9 holes. I am hoping I can get a replacement ad I really live these clubs. Highly recommend but note the denying issue. Many other people have had the same issue but I still got these due to the great price.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Hayata

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife as a good beginner set. Did a reasonable amount of research online prior to purchase and found lots of strong reviews. She loves them! Quality was great right of the box and she’s been hitting the range more than I expected. She’s 5’8”, and they fit her really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" i play casually I've only played a few times with these. They are a great set for anyone beginner or someone who plays often. I was worried they would be to long but they are not. I haven't hit the ground yet ;) they are good quality and light weight. Best deal for the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Pfister

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: This set was recommended to me by an LPGA friend. She’s also giving me lessons. Very happy with it. She says it will last my first year, but that I’ll probably be ready to move on after that.
customer_reviews.author: Snidera62

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect miracles
customer_reviews.text: I guess I was expecting more. More seasoned golfers kept saying that the new clubs would make all the difference, but—they’re about the same as my original beginner set. Pretty, new, nice bag, but not much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great description and amazing clubs for the price. I'm 5'8" and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Lore

customer_reviews.title: Decent First Golf Club Set for Beginning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a new, learning golfer. The clubs are decent and do the trick. I wish there were a 5 Iron. The bag is light and has all the right pockets. For the price it's a decent set.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife as she wanted to take up golf. Great first set. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Golfed 18 holes and 9 holes so far without damages. Nothing amazing, but a good starter set. Height worked for me, I’m 5’5”
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Great begins set
customer_reviews.text: This is a little more expensive than many of the other "beginners" sets. But it's good quality and comes with a greater selection of clubs than most.
customer_reviews.author: stevea

customer_reviews.title: Returning to golf
customer_reviews.text: I was a nine holer before kids. I‘m going to start golfing again. This set is perfect to begin again. It is more than a starter set. The clubs are very forgiving- titanium heads, graphite shafts. These clubs will provide me with years of play
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got these for the Wife
customer_reviews.text: Great set of starter clubs. Wife is new to the sport and needed a set of clubs that fit her better than using some of my old ones to train with. These clubs fit the bill. Light weight and easy to swing for a small lady.
customer_reviews.author: TMO

customer_reviews.title: Irons good. Woods not so much
customer_reviews.text: The irons are awesome. But, my daughter dented the crown of the driver with a sky ball on a seventy mile per hour swing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hard

customer_reviews.title: Complete Set
customer_reviews.text: I visit friends for 3 weeks and didn't want to spend a lot on a set of clubs. They are a decent set and they come with a bag and covers.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Myden

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality clubs
customer_reviews.text: After one visit to the range this is what happened to my driver. I’m new to golf but I wasn’t out there slamming the club on the ground. Being affiliated with Calloway I’d expect the clubs to be pretty durable. Now I’m wondering how the rest of the set will hold up when used and if I was sold counterfeit clubs. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C Jurgens

customer_reviews.title: Check them over carefully
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these clubs a year ago, have swung the driver maybe 25 times and it has 4 dents on the bottom. I am no expert, but I have never hit a ball on the bottom of the club so I am wondering if there is a defect in it. I love the bag and covers, they have been great for my first clinic, aside from needing a new driver this quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S. Hunter-smith

customer_reviews.title: It’s an 8 piece set not 11
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had read reviews before ordering. 11 Piece set is totally misleading. There are only 7 clubs. No pitching wedge. Not sure how you’re supposed to play without a pitching wedge? This is going back
customer_reviews.author: Diana Welling

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first ordered these I was afraid that they wouldn’t actually be left handed, but they are. The carry bag with all of the clubs is super light and the kickstand for it is really nice. The clubs are amazing quality and for such a good price. Everything shipped really quickly and I’m super happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Madison Clausen

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gift for my girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these clubs to replace my girlfriends 10+ year old clubs. She was thrilled at the sight of the clubs, and was very excited to go try them right away. I helped unpack them with her, and was observing the quality as we went. They look like very nice clubs. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: Golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality and color of these clubs. The had fast shipment and I really love playing with them. I would recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: Best Clubs ever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve played golf many years this is the best I’ve owned ! I bought another set for my mother my golf game had improved dramatically!! It really helps your ball with loft and distance depending on which club. Putter is great Love the hybrid’s!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss.Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Terrible club set..
customer_reviews.text: drove to range right after got my package. Open a box , unwrapping I saw scratch on club head. All clubs are look like someone was use it and clean then rewrapped . When I buy cobra club set, that one was very clean and look so new. This is terrible. So disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Lana S

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Feels like good club. Looks great and feel sturdy. I have not swing it properly yet but it’s definitely a nice set, heavier than my first set so cannot wait to test it on the green.
customer_reviews.author: Seri S

customer_reviews.title: Need a Womens starter set of golf clubs? This is it!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag that has the stand built in! A great set for a begging golfer! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Nice clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them. Seem well built. Only complaint is they don't sell idividual matching clubs to complete the set.
customer_reviews.author: Lauree

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need. Lightweight bag with many pockets. Clubs are lightweight with a good feel. Game has improved with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Love the outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of these at home and needed a second set... these didn’t disappoint. A great set for a beginner like me!
customer_reviews.author: Aksmile

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I am a beginner and this has everything I need. I really love the putter. It’s very lightweight & the bag is cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom-in-charge

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive practice
customer_reviews.text: Amazon misleads you about this set. If you click on the left hand set it is pink, if you click on the right hand it is purple. The order pic is purple but the fine print says “pink” such a disappointment by the deceptive practice by Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best upgrade golf clubs for wife! 5 star!
customer_reviews.text: Best upgrade golf clubs for wife! Glad I got them for her! She hits the ball better and everyone loves her purple golf bag! 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Den Mytrysak

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase to get back into golfing
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of my old clubs a few years ago when I had moved. Realized how much I missed my clubs and wanted to get back into golfing. Just used these this last weekend and they were perfect! I'm a petite woman (5') and these fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: First set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of golf clubs and I have been extremely happy with them. I am new to the sport and have just begun to play. I have received many complements and been told that I made an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Boers

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for product. Very light. Easy to carry. I practice at least 3 times a week with this set. My husband said perfect set for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Marika

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: after reading several reviews on clubs decided to go with these.. great clubs for the price, bag is sturdy with lots of pockets for your golfing needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice package for the money, helpful for a novice, but not sturdy. One bad swing that hit the tee/ground too hard and the driver showed a kink. The sand wedge feels too fragile to use in a wet sand trap. On the other had the bag and club covers are quite nice, and if she keeps playing we might fill it up with higher quality clubs.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs for casual golfer
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for a casual golfer. I’m 5’ 5” and the regular size is perfect. I’ve used them about 7 times and they are holding up extremely well despite some of the bad reviews I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ding easily
customer_reviews.text: The clubs are fine overall but have noticed they scratch and ding easily. I also notice stitching on my bag has started to unravel which is isn't fun since I have no idea how I'll fix it. I'm a beginner player and don't hit the ball that hard. I could've spent less money on another brand.
customer_reviews.author: A. T.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: We used this at leopard Rock golf course in Mvumba Zimbabwe. They were easy to carry and felt nice in the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning the game again
customer_reviews.text: Good starter set. Excellent for senior golfers getting back into the game. The cover for the driver is way too big for the club. My biggest complaint so far...not too bad
customer_reviews.author: Bjc

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I just started playing golf after taking 6 lessons with girlfriends. I toyed with the idea of buying much more expensive clubs like my friends did, but ended up deciding on these. Glad I did, they work great. All the clubs you will need and I'm having fun getting familiar with each of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scratched clubs
customer_reviews.text: Some of my clubs arrived with scratches on them. This can’t be normal.
customer_reviews.author: Ailleen Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set! A little long for a 5’2” women. But still great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gravlin

customer_reviews.title: Great starter golf set
customer_reviews.text: All good except the harness for carrying the clubs & bag: It's two strap "back pack" style. Much prefer a single shoulder sling strap.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip L Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect second set for the wife
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for my wife to use as second set when vacationing at the in laws. May even become the starter!
customer_reviews.author: D. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: Wife liked the new clubs, was hitting fairly straight at the driving range first day out. She is definitely enjoying the game and progressing quickly with just a couple trips to the range so far. Great deal for a full set of clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Very pink and very low quality set. I will probably start replacing clubs soon. Should have spent the extra $$ for a better and less pink set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Clubs
customer_reviews.text: Clubs are great..color fantasy and lighy weight and great to use. Received many compliments. Highly recommend at this great price. Only issue was delivery..took 4 days longer than were told!!
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Just starting again after many years. This is just the right value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to hit!
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to playing more. They were light and easy to hit. Nice bag, with room for shoes, glove and all the extras I might need. I like the pink touch on the clubs, not overwhelmingly girlie . Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Y

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Set
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner set for my wife. It provides a full set of clubs for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Two thumbs up! Brought it to my first golf lesson and my instructor was impressed with the set. Also very light weight and easy to swing!
customer_reviews.author: S&J

customer_reviews.title: Great Clubs!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my girlfriend. She absolutely loves them and has been killing it on the coarse now.
customer_reviews.author: A. Black

customer_reviews.title: If only they could improve my golf game
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift. Not sure they were worth the money I know my husband paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: frank t toscano

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just started playing and this set was perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Plewacki

customer_reviews.title: Love my Clubs!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am learning to play golf which is great. Love my clubs so much. I am doing well as a very beginner.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Love these clubs
customer_reviews.text: These are great clubs for a woman - especially if you are experienced. Just love the hybrid clubs - Big Bertha and I are trying to get our"relationship" straightened out- LOL - - but it will come!!! Would definitnely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner set. Highly recommend. Way better price here then anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set!
customer_reviews.text: My wife’s first set of clubs and she really likes them. Light weight, and a good selection of clubs.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Set
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought me this for my first set and they are absolutely amazing. Great starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set! It is perfect for someone who is in a intermediate level for golf. I would not necessarily call this a beginners set, I would recommend this set for someone who knows the basics. I love them! They are lightweight and hit very well!!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley R.

product_meta.title: STRATA Women's Golf Packaged Sets
feature_bullets: The Strata Plus Women’s package set is designed with distance and forgiveness technologies for women who want to easily hit accurate shots that go a long way
Set includes: Driver, 5 Wood, 5 Hybrid, 6 to 9 Iron, PW & SW, Putter, Stand Bag, and 3 Headcovers
Woods: Driver has a 460cc clubhead with a larger sweet spot and graphite shaft for more distance off the tee. The fairway wood promotes faster swing speeds and long shots
Irons: The 6 9 irons have perimeter weighting and progressive sole width technology for improved control
Putter: Mallet putter with alignment to help give you incredible accuracy
